title: The way to bliss. In three books. Made publick, by Elias Ashmole Esq.
author: Ashmole, Elias, 1617-1692.
publisher: printed by John Grismond for Nath. Brook, at the Angel in Corn-hill,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill"; "June" is crossed out. The Thomason Catalogue says "Aprill 27".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
